statements: SELECT * FROM student_accounts WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM student_accounts WHERE student_id > 3;
SELECT password FROM student_accounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM student_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT full_name FROM student_accounts ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM student_accounts WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT student_id, full_name FROM student_accounts WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT full_name, email FROM student_accounts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_accounts;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%J%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_id, email FROM students WHERE student_id > 3
SELECT DISTINCT student_name FROM students
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students s JOIN enrollment e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT student_email, course_description FROM students s JOIN enrollment e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM courses WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, permission_level FROM students JOIN permissions ON students.student_id = permissions.student_id WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_credits > 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY student_email ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_enrollments FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_enrollments > 1 ORDER BY num_enrollments DESC;

SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM courses c JOIN enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id JOIN grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING avg_grade > 80 ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(attempt_time) AS last_attempt FROM login_attempts GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY last_attempt DESC LIMIT 5;
